trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost.LayoutError"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs> class enables the user to preview a layout-related exception before it is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs>클래스 발생 하기 전에 레이아웃 관련 예외를 미리 볼 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: 값을 설정 하 여 이벤트 처리기의는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>속성을 `true` 를 나타내는 예외를 발생 시켜야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.LayoutExceptionEventArgs"></xref> class.
In your event handler, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: 값을 설정 하 여 이벤트 처리기의는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>속성을 `true` 를 나타내는 예외를 발생 시켜야 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>
